description:
MakerV2Loan.debt(uint256) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#472-488) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-_fullRepayment = art.mul(rate).div(RAY).add(1).add(art - art.mul(rate).div(RAY).mul(RAY).div(rate)) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#484-486)
markdown:
[MakerV2Loan.debt(uint256)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L472-L488) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[_fullRepayment = art.mul(rate).div(RAY).add(1).add(art - art.mul(rate).div(RAY).mul(RAY).div(rate))](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L484-L486)

description:
CompoundManager.closeLoan(BaseWallet,bytes32) (modules/CompoundManager.sol#127-148) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- collateral == 0 (modules/CompoundManager.sol#142)

CompoundManager.exitMarketIfNeeded(BaseWallet,address,address) (modules/CompoundManager.sol#434-440) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- collateral == 0 && debt == 0 (modules/CompoundManager.sol#437)
markdown:
[CompoundManager.exitMarketIfNeeded(BaseWallet,address,address)](contracts/modules/CompoundManager.sol#L434-L440) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [collateral == 0 && debt == 0](contracts/modules/CompoundManager.sol#L437)

elements.name: require(bool,string)(recoveryConfigs[address(_wallet)].executeAfter == 0,RM: there cannot be an ongoing recovery)

description:
RecoveryManager.notWhenRecovery(BaseWallet) (modules/RecoveryManager.sol#79-82) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(recoveryConfigs[address(_wallet)].executeAfter == 0,RM: there cannot be an ongoing recovery) (modules/RecoveryManager.sol#80)
markdown:
[RecoveryManager.notWhenRecovery(BaseWallet)](contracts/modules/RecoveryManager.sol#L79-L82) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [require(bool,string)(recoveryConfigs[address(_wallet)].executeAfter == 0,RM: there cannot be an ongoing recovery)](contracts/modules/RecoveryManager.sol#L80)

description:
Reentrancy in MakerV2Loan.giveVault(BaseWallet,bytes32) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#333-344):
	External calls:
	- cdpManager.give(uint256(_loanId),msg.sender) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#342)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- clearLoanOwner(_wallet,_loanId) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#343)
		- delete loanIds[address(_wallet)][cdpManager.ilks(uint256(_loanId))] (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#368)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [MakerV2Loan.giveVault(BaseWallet,bytes32)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L333-L344):
	External calls:
	- [cdpManager.give(uint256(_loanId),msg.sender)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L342)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [clearLoanOwner(_wallet,_loanId)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L343)
		- [delete loanIds[address(_wallet)][cdpManager.ilks(uint256(_loanId))]](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L368)

description:
Reentrancy in MakerV2Loan.openVault(BaseWallet,address,uint256,uint256) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#521-549):
	External calls:
	- _cdpId = cdpManager.open(ilk,address(this)) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#539)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- loanIds[address(_wallet)][ilk] = bytes32(_cdpId) (modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#541)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [MakerV2Loan.openVault(BaseWallet,address,uint256,uint256)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L521-L549):
	External calls:
	- [_cdpId = cdpManager.open(ilk,address(this))](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L539)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [loanIds[address(_wallet)][ilk] = bytes32(_cdpId)](contracts/modules/maker/MakerV2Loan.sol#L541)

description:
LimitManager.limits (modules/common/LimitManager.sol#56) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- LimitManager.init(address) (modules/common/LimitManager.sol#76-81)
	- LimitManager.changeLimit(address,uint256,uint256) (modules/common/LimitManager.sol#92-102)
	- LimitManager.getCurrentLimit(address) (modules/common/LimitManager.sol#119-122)
	- LimitManager.getPendingLimit(address) (modules/common/LimitManager.sol#139-143)
	- LimitManager.getDailyUnspent(address) (modules/common/LimitManager.sol#150-164)
	- LimitManager.checkAndUpdateDailySpent(address,uint256) (modules/common/LimitManager.sol#172-182)
	- LimitManager.updateDailySpent(address,uint128,uint256) (modules/common/LimitManager.sol#190-202)
	- LimitManager.isWithinDailyLimit(address,uint256,uint256) (modules/common/LimitManager.sol#211-222)
markdown:
[LimitManager.limits](contracts/modules/common/LimitManager.sol#L56) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- [LimitManager.init(address)](contracts/modules/common/LimitManager.sol#L76-L81)
	- [LimitManager.changeLimit(address,uint256,uint256)](contracts/modules/common/LimitManager.sol#L92-L102)
	- [LimitManager.getCurrentLimit(address)](contracts/modules/common/LimitManager.sol#L119-L122)
	- [LimitManager.getPendingLimit(address)](contracts/modules/common/LimitManager.sol#L139-L143)
	- [LimitManager.getDailyUnspent(address)](contracts/modules/common/LimitManager.sol#L150-L164)
	- [LimitManager.checkAndUpdateDailySpent(address,uint256)](contracts/modules/common/LimitManager.sol#L172-L182)
	- [LimitManager.updateDailySpent(address,uint128,uint256)](contracts/modules/common/LimitManager.sol#L190-L202)
	- [LimitManager.isWithinDailyLimit(address,uint256,uint256)](contracts/modules/common/LimitManager.sol#L211-L222)

description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Proxy (wallet/Proxy.sol#24-51) has payable functions:
	 - Proxy.fallback() (wallet/Proxy.sol#34-50)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [Proxy](contracts/wallet/Proxy.sol#L24-L51) has payable functions:
	 - [Proxy.fallback()](contracts/wallet/Proxy.sol#L34-L50)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
